title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; runs in Node, Deno, Bun and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package that adds Ollama as a LLM provider inside LangChain for chat, generation and embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat interface, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama; sync/async APIs, model management, embeddings.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple DSL for chat, generate and pull commands.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps Ollama REST API with fzf model picker and chat REPL.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot chat pane.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal pod autoscaler.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that chats using any local Ollama model with slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Lightweight Rust crate wrapping Ollama REST endpoints with Tokio and SSE streaming.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama; idiomatic interfaces and built-in context cancellation.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams query local Ollama models via threads and app mentions.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside notes and get inline completions.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve deployment example that scales Ollama models across GPU workers with autoscaling.

title: ollama-model-gallery
summary: Curated collection of community-tuned GGUF models ready to pull via Ollama registry.
